channel.title: BCAssessment on Mountain Doodles
channel.description: Recent content in BCAssessment on Mountain Doodles

item.title: On Houses and Dirt
item.description: The story of Vancouver real estate is mostly a story of dirt. After spending a bit of time to collect relevant data I am now wondering how to make better visualizations to make that data more accessible. Looking at my old maps based around assessment data, there are a couple of things that bother me. They are not very good at showing changes over time. And they are not very good at highlighting the different role of dirt and the houses on top.
